references.paper_title: The shift from models to compound AI systems
references.reason: This paper establishes the context of the research by introducing the concept of compound AI systems, which are the focus of the study.
This work provides a comprehensive overview of GPT-4, a large language model crucial for the proposed generative optimization methods.
This seminal paper introduces backpropagation, a core concept underlying the proposed optimization approach and its relationship to execution traces.

references.paper_title: PyTorch: an imperative style, high-performance deep learning library
references.reason: PyTorch is the framework upon which the Trace library is built, making it a critical reference for understanding the implementation details.

references.paper_title: LLF-Bench: Benchmark for interactive learning from language feedback
references.reason: LLF-Bench is used as the benchmark for the robot control experiments demonstrating the effectiveness of the proposed methods in a practical scenario.
